question: Who is the new High Commissioner of India to the Republic of Ghana?
explanation: C. Sugandh Rajaram has been appointed as the next High Commissioner of India to the Republic of Ghana. Rajaram is presently the Consul General, Consulate General of India to Southern Germany. He will replace Birender Singh Yadav as the next High Commissioner of India to the Republic of Ghana. The announcement was made by the Ministry of External Affairs. Mr. Sugandh Rajaram is an IFS officer of 2001 batch. He is an electronics engineer by graduate.
